title: Virginia In The Rain
lyrics:
Burn your finger playing with fire
But you never know until you try
Come on let's go let's jump right in
We will rope swing and river swim
Virginia naked in the rain
You make me feel like a kid again

Don't wanna say goodbye to you

The summer always ends too soon



Whatever you want I'll give you that

But tell me we won't grow up too fast

Let's make believe it's gonna last

Forever doesn't seem long enough

Forever doesn't seem long enough



And I will capture your flag

Take a rocket ship to the moon and back

We'll build castles in the riverbank

Don't ever grow up too fast

We'll turn the music up and dance

And we'll turn up the music and dance



Whatever you want I'll give you that

Tell me we won't grow up too fast

Let's make believe this is gonna last

Forever doesn't seem long enough

Forever doesn't seem long enough

Forever



I will hold you up over my head

Spread your wings and

Fly throughout the air

Baby don't grow up too fast

Let's turn up the music and dance

And dance and dance

Virginia naked in the rain

Make me feel like a kid again



Whatever you want I'll give you that

Tell me we won't grow up too fast

Let's make believe this is gonna last

Forever doesn't seem long enough



Whatever you want I'll give you that

Tell me we won't grow up too fast

Let's make believe this is gonna last

Forever doesn't seem long enough

Forever doesn't seem long enough



I will hold you up over my head

Spread your wings and fly through the air

Don't grow up too fast

Baby don't grow up too fast
